summary: Improved version of the original LeatherBound Huntress Armour by Shadowtroop. Since he's out of modding, he let me continue the development of this awesome armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is an improved version of the original [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11143/?]LeatherBound Huntress Armour by Shadowtroop[/URL]. Since he's out of modding, he let me continue the development of this awesome armor.

Currently supported are CBBE body (as it always was) and UNP body (development of this one is in progress). There is also a [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26757/?]UNPB BBP conversion from Belisariu[/URL].

My improvements are not only limited to UNP conversion. I also introduced ground items for every piece of armor (originally substituted by steel armor mesh) and many ESP fixes.
UNP conversion will be further improved to better fit the body and include weight slider. Seren4XX have informed me, that he's working on it, so it will be done. By him or by me. I'll link to his work or include it here. We'll see.

This armor is female only and doesn't support weight slider (it never did, not my fault). On males it shows as steel armor (except for hood, which will use Dark Brotherhood model).
Armor can be crafted under Leather category or found in the Huntress' Stash (chest located in Riverwood, see screenshots). The chest is set to respawn, so it basically should replenish the stock after some time (probably a few months of game time, not sure).
author: Shadowtroop and Erundil
